long_description: Offering great all-around performance with a comfortable riding position for new road cyclists, the Cannondale CAAD8 5 Compact road bike features a lightweight frame and dependable Shimano 105 parts. Lightweight double-butted aluminum frame supplies excellent power transfer; design offers a slightly more relaxed position compared to other road bikes. Ultra carbon fiber fork serves up great handling so you can carve through corners; carbon fiber also helps damp high frequency road vibrations. FSA Gossamer Pro crankset powers the 20-gear drivetrain, which features reliable and responsive Shimano 105 levers and derailleurs. Tektro dual-pivot caliper brakes offer up dependable braking performance. Strong Maddux rims with Schwalbe Lugano tires keep you rolling smoothly. Cannondale CAAD8 5 Compact road bike specs are subject to change.
short_description: Offering great all-around performance with a comfortable riding position for new road cyclists, the Cannondale CAAD8 5 Compact road bike features a lightweight frame and dependable Shimano 105 parts.
